title: Apartment in Needham for rent
posting_body: Beautiful, clean and cozy apartment for rent in 3 unit house in the center of Needham.
First floor has kitchen, living area and half bath, second - bedroom and full bath, third can be used as office space or small bedroom/storage.
Balcony facing the woods and water view.
Enter the Rosemary lake trail from the backyard.
Minutes of walk away from all the shops, restaurants, train station, library and all the good stuff.
Couple minutes away from a gorgeous newly renovated outside pool.
One or two parking spots by the unit.
First, last month and deposit required.
